name: DiceCrawler
description:
Clear the dungeon! Destroy the magic crystals and don't let the skeletons overrun you!
Manoeuvring, strafing and switching dice will be key to your success.

Projectiles sometimes fizzle out :( *sad physics noises*

Dice
DiceDamage
RangeCooldownd201-20shortlongd61-6mediumshortd20-1farvery short

Old school control scheme

Move Forward
[Up Arrow]
Move Backward
[Down Arrow]
Turn Right
Right Arrow]
Turn Left
[Left Arrow]
Roll Dice
[Space]Switch Dice
[Left CTRL]Strafe Left
[ALT] + [Left Arrow]
Strafe Right
[ALT] + [Right Arrow]
Quit[ESC]
